targets.rawSql:
SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", 30 - CHAR_LENGTH('Web')), 'Web')
FROM(
SELECT 'Web:innen' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", 30 - CHAR_LENGTH('App')), 'App')
FROM(
SELECT 'App:innen' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", 30 - CHAR_LENGTH('Facebook')), 'Facebook')
FROM(
SELECT 'Facebook:innen' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", 30 - CHAR_LENGTH('Instagram')), 'Instagram')
FROM(
SELECT 'Instagram:innen' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", 30 - CHAR_LENGTH('Visits')), 'Visits')
FROM(
SELECT 'Visits:innen' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", 30 - CHAR_LENGTH('Audio- und Videostarts')), 'Audio- und Videostarts')
FROM(
SELECT 'Audio- und Videostarts:innen' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", 30 - CHAR_LENGTH('Visits')), 'Visits')
FROM(
SELECT 'Visits:innen' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", 30 - CHAR_LENGTH('Aktive Nutzer')), 'Aktive Nutzer')
FROM(
SELECT 'Aktive Nutzer:innen' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", 30 - CHAR_LENGTH('Interaktionen')), 'Interaktionen')
FROM(
SELECT 'Interaktionen' as Interaktionen
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebook`
LIMIT 1
)

SELECT SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0)) as summe 
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits`
WHERE site_level2 = "ndr.de" AND
${web_redaktionen:doublequote} = page_chapter1 AND
${Unterkapitel:doublequote} = page_chapter2 AND
"Alle Sendungs-ID" = sendungs_id 
AND EXTRACT(MONTH from date) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from date) = $Jahr

WITH vid_sum AS(
SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0)) as summeVideo
FROM 
  `Piano.av`
WHERE 
site_level2 = "ndr.de" AND
"$web_redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "Alle Sendungs-ID" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND EXTRACT(MONTH from date) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from date) = $Jahr
AND av_content_type = "Video" 
),
audio_sum as(SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0)) as summeAudio
FROM 
  `Piano.av`
WHERE 
site_level2 = "ndr.de" AND
"$web_redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "Alle Sendungs-ID" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND EXTRACT(MONTH from date) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from date) = $Jahr
AND av_content_type = "Audio")
SELECT
  (summeVideo + summeAudio)
FROM
  vid_sum, audio_sum as relative_sum
-- OR 
-- AND 
-- av_content_type ="Audio"

SELECT
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0))
FROM
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "$page_chapter1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
AND EXTRACT(MONTH from date) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from date) = $Jahr

SELECT  CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", 5- CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(page_engaged_users as STRING))), REPLACE(CAST(FORMAT("%'.0f", CAST(ROUND(page_engaged_users) as NUMERIC)) AS STRING), ",", ".")) AS current_value
FROM
(
  SELECT ROUND(SUM(page_engaged_users) / 
              DATE_DIFF(
                LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), MONTH),
                DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1),
                DAY
              ) + 1,0) as page_engaged_users
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights`
WHERE profileId = $profile_ID_FB 
AND EXTRACT(MONTH from time) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from time) = $Jahr
)

IF $profile_ID_INSTA = 0 THEN
SELECT
  "N/A(No account)";
ELSE
SELECT
  CONCAT(
    REPEAT(
      " ",
      5 - CHAR_LENGTH(CAST(totalInteractions as STRING))
    ),
    REPLACE(
      CAST(
        FORMAT(
          "%'.0f",
          CAST(ROUND(totalInteractions) as NUMERIC)
        ) AS STRING
      ),
      ",",
      "."
    )
  ) totalInteractions
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      ROUND(
        SUM(
          CASE
            WHEN type = 'Reel' THEN IFNULL(totalInteractions, 0)
            ELSE IFNULL(engagement, 0)
          END
        ) / DATE_DIFF(
          LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), MONTH),
          DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1),
          DAY
        ) + 1,
        0
      ) AS totalInteractions
    FROM
      `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.instagramInsightsOwnPosts`
    WHERE
      profileId = $profile_ID_INSTA
      AND EXTRACT(
        MONTH
        from
          time
      ) = $Monat
      AND EXTRACT(
        YEAR
        from
          time
      ) = $Jahr
  );
END IF;

WITH past_value as(
  SELECT
    SUM(IFNULL(m_visits, 0)) as past_sum
  FROM
    `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits`
  WHERE
    site_level2 = "ndr.de"
    AND ${web_redaktionen:doublequote} = page_chapter1
    AND ${Unterkapitel:doublequote} = page_chapter2
    AND "Alle Sendungs-ID" = sendungs_id
    AND EXTRACT(
      MONTH
      from
        date
    ) = EXTRACT(
      MONTH
      from
        DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
    )
    AND EXTRACT(
      YEAR
      from
        date
    ) = EXTRACT(
      YEAR
      from
        DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
    )
),
current_value AS (
  SELECT
    SUM(IFNULL(m_visits, 0)) as current_sum
  FROM
    `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits`
  WHERE
    site_level2 = "ndr.de"
    AND ${web_redaktionen:doublequote} = page_chapter1
    AND ${Unterkapitel:doublequote} = page_chapter2
    AND "Alle Sendungs-ID" = sendungs_id
    AND EXTRACT(
      MONTH
      from
        date
    ) = $Monat
    AND EXTRACT(
      YEAR
      from
        date
    ) = $Jahr
)
SELECT
  ((current_sum - past_sum) / past_sum) * 100
FROM
  current_value, past_value as relative_difference

WITH vid_sum_current AS(
  SELECT
    SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks, 0)) as summeVideoCurrent
  FROM
    `Piano.av`
  WHERE
    site_level2 = "ndr.de"
    AND "$web_redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags)
    AND "$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
    AND "Alle Sendungs-ID" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
    AND EXTRACT(
      MONTH
      from
        date
    ) = $Monat
    AND EXTRACT(
      YEAR
      from
        date
    ) = $Jahr
    AND av_content_type = "Video"
),
vid_sum_past AS(
  SELECT
    SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks, 0)) as summeVideoPast
  FROM
    `Piano.av`
  WHERE
    site_level2 = "ndr.de"
    AND "$web_redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags)
    AND "$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
    AND "Alle Sendungs-ID" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
    AND EXTRACT(
      MONTH
      from
        date
    ) = EXTRACT(
      MONTH
      from
        DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
    )
    AND EXTRACT(
      YEAR
      from
        date
    ) = EXTRACT(
      YEAR
      from
        DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
    )
    AND av_content_type = "Video"
),
audio_sum_current as(
  SELECT
    SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks, 0)) as summeAudioCurrent
  FROM
    `Piano.av`
  WHERE
    site_level2 = "ndr.de"
    AND "$web_redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags)
    AND "$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
    AND "Alle Sendungs-ID" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
    AND EXTRACT(
      MONTH
      from
        date
    ) = $Monat
    AND EXTRACT(
      YEAR
      from
        date
    ) = $Jahr
    AND av_content_type = "Audio"
),
audio_sum_past as(
  SELECT
    SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks, 0)) as summeAudioPast
  FROM
    `Piano.av`
  WHERE
    site_level2 = "ndr.de"
    AND "$web_redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags)
    AND "$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
    AND "Alle Sendungs-ID" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
    AND EXTRACT(
      MONTH
      from
        date
    ) = EXTRACT(
      MONTH
      from
        DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
    )
    AND EXTRACT(
      YEAR
      from
        date
    ) = EXTRACT(
      YEAR
      from
        DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
    )
    AND av_content_type = "Audio"
)
SELECT
  (
    (
      (summeVideoCurrent + summeAudioCurrent) - (summeVideoPast + summeAudioPast)
    ) /(summeVideoPast + summeAudioPast)
  ) * 100
FROM
  vid_sum_current,
  vid_sum_past,
  audio_sum_current,
  audio_sum_past as relative_difference

WITH past_value as(
 SELECT
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) AS past_sum
FROM
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "$page_chapter1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
    AND EXTRACT(
      MONTH
      from
        date
    ) = EXTRACT(
      MONTH
      from
        DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
    )
    AND EXTRACT(
      YEAR
      from
        date
    ) = EXTRACT(
      YEAR
      from
        DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
    )
),
current_value AS (
 SELECT
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) AS current_sum
FROM
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "Alle Kapitel 1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
AND EXTRACT(MONTH from date) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from date) = $Jahr

)
SELECT
  ((current_sum - past_sum) / past_sum) * 100
FROM
  current_value, past_value as relative_difference

WITH past_value as(
  SELECT
    page_engaged_users AS past_tagesmittel
  FROM
    (
      SELECT
        ROUND(
          SUM(page_engaged_users) / DATE_DIFF(
            LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), MONTH),
            DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1),
            DAY
          ) + 1,
          0
        ) as page_engaged_users
      FROM
        `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights`
      WHERE
        profileId = $profile_ID_FB
        AND EXTRACT(
          MONTH
          from
            time
        ) = EXTRACT(
          MONTH
          from
            DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
        )
        AND EXTRACT(
          YEAR
          from
            time
        ) = EXTRACT(
          YEAR
          from
            DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
        )
    )
),
current_value AS (
  SELECT
    page_engaged_users AS current_tagesmittel
  FROM
    (
      SELECT
        ROUND(
          SUM(page_engaged_users) / DATE_DIFF(
            LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), MONTH),
            DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1),
            DAY
          ) + 1,
          0
        ) as page_engaged_users
      FROM
        `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights`
      WHERE
        profileId = $profile_ID_FB
        AND EXTRACT(
          MONTH
          from
            time
        ) = $Monat
        AND EXTRACT(
          YEAR
          from
            time
        ) = $Jahr
    )
)
SELECT
  (
    (current_tagesmittel - past_tagesmittel) / past_tagesmittel
  ) * 100
FROM
  current_value,
  past_value as relative_difference

WITH past_value as(
  SELECT
    totalInteractions as past_totalInteractions
  FROM
    (
      SELECT
        ROUND(
          SUM(
            CASE
              WHEN type = 'Reel' THEN IFNULL(totalInteractions, 0)
              ELSE IFNULL(engagement, 0)
            END
          ) / DATE_DIFF(
            LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), MONTH),
            DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1),
            DAY
          ) + 1,
          0
        ) AS totalInteractions
      FROM
        `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.instagramInsightsOwnPosts`
      WHERE
        profileId = $profile_ID_INSTA
        AND EXTRACT(
          MONTH
          from
            time
        ) = EXTRACT(
          MONTH
          from
            DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
        )
        AND EXTRACT(
          YEAR
          from
            time
        ) = EXTRACT(
          YEAR
          from
            DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
        )
    )
),
current_value AS (
  SELECT
    totalInteractions as current_totalInteractions
  FROM
    (
      SELECT
        ROUND(
          SUM(
            CASE
              WHEN type = 'Reel' THEN IFNULL(totalInteractions, 0)
              ELSE IFNULL(engagement, 0)
            END
          ) / DATE_DIFF(
            LAST_DAY(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), MONTH),
            DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1),
            DAY
          ) + 1,
          0
        ) AS totalInteractions
      FROM
        `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.instagramInsightsOwnPosts`
      WHERE
        profileId = $profile_ID_INSTA
        AND EXTRACT(
          MONTH
          from
            time
        ) = $Monat
        AND EXTRACT(
          YEAR
          from
            time
        ) = $Jahr
    )
)
SELECT
  (
    (
      current_totalInteractions - past_totalInteractions
    ) / past_totalInteractions
  ) * 100
FROM
  current_value,
  past_value as relative_difference

SELECT
SUM(page_engaged_users), time
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.facebookInsights` 
-- as facebook
WHERE profileId = $profile_ID_FB 
AND time BETWEEN timestamp('${__from:date}') AND timestamp('${__to:date}')
-- JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (facebook.profileId = profiles.facebookID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
-- Daten des ausgewählten Zeitraums minus 1 Jahr
-- WHERE DATE(EXTRACT(YEAR from time),EXTRACT(MONTH from time), 1) <= DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1) AND DATE(EXTRACT(YEAR from time),EXTRACT(MONTH from time), 1)  >= DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 12 MONTH) 
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT
ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN type = 'Reel' THEN IFNULL(totalInteractions, 0) ELSE IFNULL(engagement, 0)END),0),
timestamp(time) as time
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.instagramInsightsOwnPosts`
WHERE profileId = $profile_ID_INSTA
AND time BETWEEN timestamp('${__from:date}') AND timestamp('${__to:date}')
--  as instagram
-- JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (instagram.profileId = profiles.instagramID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
-- Daten des ausgewählten Zeitraums minus 1 Jahr
-- WHERE DATE(EXTRACT(YEAR from time),EXTRACT(MONTH from time), 1) <= DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1) AND DATE(EXTRACT(YEAR from time),EXTRACT(MONTH from time), 1)  >= DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 12 MONTH) 
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0)) as summe_web, timestamp(date) as date
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.total_visits`
WHERE site_level2 = "ndr.de" AND
${web_redaktionen:doublequote} = page_chapter1 AND
${Unterkapitel:doublequote} = page_chapter2 AND
"Alle Sendungs-ID" = sendungs_id 
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}') AND DATE('${__to:date}')
-- AND EXTRACT(MONTH from date) = $Monat AND EXTRACT(YEAR from date) = $Jahr
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date ASC

-- SELECT
-- ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN type = 'Reel' THEN IFNULL(totalInteractions, 0) ELSE IFNULL(engagement, 0)END),0),
-- timestamp(time) as time
-- FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.instagramInsightsOwnPosts`
-- WHERE profileId = $profile_ID_INSTA

-- --  as instagram
-- -- JOIN `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Quintly.profiles` as profiles ON (instagram.profileId = profiles.instagramID AND profiles.LRA = "$LRA")
-- -- Daten des ausgewählten Zeitraums minus 1 Jahr
-- -- WHERE DATE(EXTRACT(YEAR from time),EXTRACT(MONTH from time), 1) <= DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1) AND DATE(EXTRACT(YEAR from time),EXTRACT(MONTH from time), 1)  >= DATE_SUB(DATE($Jahr, $Monat, 1), INTERVAL 12 MONTH) 
-- GROUP BY time
-- ORDER BY time ASC
-- ....
SELECT
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as visits_app,
   timestamp(date) as time
FROM
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE site_level2 = '${app_name}'
  AND page_chapter1 = "$page_chapter1"
  AND page_chapter2 = "Alle Kapitel 2"
  AND sendungs_id = "Alle Sendungs-ID"
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}') AND DATE('${__to:date}')
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time ASC

list.name: Redaktionen
list.query:
Info, Sport, Hamburg, Niedersachen, 	
Schleswig-Holstein, Mecklenburg-Vorpommern

list.name: Monat
list.query: Januar : 1, Februar :  2, März : 3, April : 4, Mai : 5, Juni : 6, Juli : 7, August : 8, September : 9, Oktober : 10, November : 11, Dezember : 12

query.rawSql:
SELECT CASE "$Redaktionen"
   WHEN "Info" THEN 26568
   WHEN "Sport" THEN 46842
   WHEN "Hamburg" THEN 81784
   WHEN "Niedersachen" THEN 26036
   WHEN "Schleswig-Holstein" THEN 106580
   WHEN "Mecklenburg-Vorpommern" THEN 81780
END

SELECT CASE "$Redaktionen"
   WHEN "Info" THEN 404008
   WHEN "Sport" THEN 0
   WHEN "Hamburg" THEN 400977
   WHEN "Niedersachen" THEN 396752
   WHEN "Schleswig-Holstein" THEN 409406
   WHEN "Mecklenburg-Vorpommern" THEN 403292
END

SELECT CASE "$Redaktionen"
   WHEN "Info" THEN 234533
   WHEN "Sport" THEN 234532
   WHEN "Hamburg" THEN Null
   WHEN "Niedersachen" THEN 234536
   WHEN "Schleswig-Holstein" THEN 276307
   WHEN "Mecklenburg-Vorpommern" THEN 234531
   ELSE Null
END

current.value: EXTRACT(DATE from time) >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  7 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE from time) < CURRENT_DATE()

list.name: Zeitraum

options.value: EXTRACT(DATE from time) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  1 DAY)

DATE(time) >= (  SELECT    saturday  FROM (    SELECT      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS sunday,      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) AS saturday ) )  AND DATE(time) <= (  SELECT    sunday  FROM (    SELECT      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS sunday,      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) AS saturday ) )
EXTRACT(DATE from time) >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  7 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE from time) < CURRENT_DATE()
EXTRACT(DATE from time) >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL  30 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE from time) < CURRENT_DATE()

list.query: Gestern : EXTRACT(DATE from time) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  1 DAY), Letztes Wochenende :  DATE(time) >= (  SELECT    saturday  FROM (    SELECT      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()\, WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS sunday\,      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()\, WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) AS saturday ) )  AND DATE(time) <= (  SELECT    sunday  FROM (    SELECT      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()\, WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS sunday\,      DATE(TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()\, WEEK(MONDAY)) - INTERVAL 2 DAY) AS saturday ) ), Letzte 7 Tage : EXTRACT(DATE from time) >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  7 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE from time) < CURRENT_DATE(), Letzte 30 Tage : EXTRACT(DATE from time) >=  DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  30 DAY) AND EXTRACT(DATE from time) < CURRENT_DATE()

query.rawSql:
SELECT CASE "$Redaktionen"
WHEN "Info" THEN "nachrichten"
WHEN "Hamburg" THEN "nachrichten"
WHEN "Niedersachen" THEN "nachrichten"
WHEN "Schleswig-Holstein" THEN "nachrichten"
WHEN "Mecklenburg-Vorpommern" THEN "nachrichten"
WHEN "Sport" THEN "sport"
END

SELECT CASE "$Redaktionen"
WHEN "Info" THEN "info"
WHEN "Hamburg" THEN "hamburg"
WHEN "Niedersachen" THEN "niedersachsen"
WHEN "Schleswig-Holstein" THEN "schleswig-holstein"
WHEN "Mecklenburg-Vorpommern" THEN "mecklenburg-vorpommern"
WHEN "Sport" THEN "Alle Kapitel 2"
END

SELECT
CASE $Monat
WHEN 1 THEN "Jan."
WHEN 2 THEN "Feb."
WHEN 3 THEN "März"
WHEN 4 THEN "Apr."
WHEN 5 THEN "Mai"
WHEN 6 THEN "Juni"
WHEN 7 THEN "Juli"
WHEN 8 THEN "Aug."
WHEN 9 THEN "Sep."
WHEN 10 THEN "Okt."
WHEN 11 THEN "Nov."
WHEN 12 THEN "Dez."
END

SELECT CASE "$Redaktionen"
  WHEN "Info" THEN "ndrinfo-app"
  WHEN "Sport" THEN "ndr.de"
  WHEN "Hamburg" THEN "hh-app"
  WHEN "Niedersachen" THEN "nds-app"
  WHEN "Schleswig-Holstein" THEN "sh-app"
  WHEN "Mecklenburg-Vorpommern" THEN "mv-app"
END

-- radio-app, orchester-app, hh-app, kultur-app, sesamstraßen-app, ndrinfo-app, sh-app, nds-app, n-joy-app, mv-app

SELECT CASE "$Redaktionen"
  WHEN "Sport" THEN "sport"
  ELSE "Alle Kapitel 1"
END
